uc:usecase.uc:name: Modify Aggregation Rules Parameters
uc:usecase.uc:goal: Possibility to modify the parameters of the predefined aggregation rules.
uc:usecase.uc:stakeholder: Merchant wants to have the aggregation of the micro payment amounts to be settled due to certain conditions.
Service Provider wants to transfer the responsibility to define the aggregation parameters to the merchant.

uc:guarantees.uc:success: Merchant could set the parmeters for the aggregation rules successfully.
uc:guarantees.minimal: Merchant is notified about the failure of the modification or what went wrong.

uc:success.uc:step: Merchant enters aggregation rules parameters configuration view.
System checks, if merchant is logged in.

System displays the aggregation rules with their editeable parameters:
minimum amount limit maximum amount limit time passed since last settlement link to submit the changed data.

uc:extension.name: SUBMIT CHANGES
uc:extension.uc:step: System checks, if the aggregation rules parameters against system rules.
System stores the new aggregation rules parameters
